/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Trees line the street, adding a touch of greenery to the concrete surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the background. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the colors of the scene.
